text: @NYGovCuomo Of course you are. You are nothing but a murderer. You mandated discharge of Covid-19 patients to nursing homes, KNOWING that it would kill our most vulnerable. You denied access to hydroxychloroquine, KNOWING that people would die without help. #Seniorcide #CuomoLiedPeopleDied
